products.title: Orient Faux Silk White Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Orient faux silk white roman blind in white. Made to measure from 14.99 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

products.title: Velvet Canvas Cream Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Velvet canvas cream roman blind in cream. Made to measure from 17.59 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. 
 
This soft roman blind in canvas cream, introduces a warm-toned cream hue to your home. A light cream shade creates a sense of warmth and calm, and this velvet cream roman blind creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 
At swift direct blinds, not only is this roman blind made by the experts at their yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, their roman blinds are made to last. Their roman blinds come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service!

products.productdescription: Simply toned, this time with fresh white, the mayfair is a combination of deluxe silky threads and sumptuous cotton, creating a sheer and shimmering blind with elegant finesse, whilst sewn-in batons within each fold encourage a graceful fall and prevent the layers from sagging.Generate a luxurious effect by adorning the white with contrasting textures and intense colours, both to frame the silky blind and to add depth and personality. Choose royal blue hues for a rich and intense tone or soothing aquas to encourage a feeling of light and space.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Faux Suede, White - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Faux suede, white - roman blind the faux suede in white takes a lightweight, suede-feel cloth and covers it with a sea of pure white, making for an icy cool blind that gets its warmth from its soft texture. This supple fabric will fold easily into the ple
products.productdescription: The faux suede in white takes a lightweight, suede-feel cloth and covers it with a sea of pure white, making for an icy cool blind that gets its warmth from its soft texture. This supple fabric will fold easily into the pleated curves of the roman, leaving a dreamy and wistful ambience. The white offers a beautifully clean aesthetic, making it the perfect base from which to add brighteror darker hues with plenty of personality. Be brave and place on a navy blue feature wall, matching the rest of the room in matching hues with plenty of patterns. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.productdescription: Pure and simple, the windsor white is the colour of snow, and adds a cool and refreshing vibe to the home without compromising on class or elegance. This light and pretty shade forms a beautiful roman blind, strengthened in appearance by the shimmering sheen of the silk-like fabric. The white can be paired with any colour combination you choose. products.productdescription: The nairobi in snow adds a casual sense of glamour to any room, with its chocolate animal print and beautiful sketches. The fabric contains linen, giving it lasting durability as well as that classic linen look and feel.Hang the snow amidst similar browns and creams, and consider a deep chocolate feature wall for a striking look. Add shimmering golds and plush camels for a truly luxurious style, and be sure to throw in plenty of soft fabrics for extra comfort.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width.
